ISSUE.TITLE: Impossible to upload file with firefox
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Bug When we upload a file on any document page with firefox navigator the navigator change page instead of opening file form. Same for URL form. ### Dolibarr Version develop ### Environment PHP 8.4 ### Environment Database _No response_ ### Steps to reproduce the behavior and expected behavior - Open any module document page - click on + button to open file form - See that firefox navigate to a page instead of opening file form Same behavior for URL form ### Attached files _No response_
